findings.description: Bug: plan.js:286 calls session.getAll() but SessionContextManager has no getAll() method. Should use session.getContext() instead.
Bug: phase.js:160 calls session.getAll() but method doesn't exist. Should use session.getContext()
Bug: session.js:160 calls session.getAll() but method doesn't exist. Should use session.getContext()
Process cleanup in verification timeout - _runVerification method uses spawn with 60s timeout but lacks explicit process cleanup, can lead to zombie processes
Subagent result validation missing - code assumes subagentResult has expected properties without validation, malformed data could cause undefined behavior
TOCTOU race condition - File existence check (existsSync) before staging creates time-of-check-time-of-use vulnerability
Missing comprehensive error handling in _executeTaskViaSubagent - need to differentiate between timeout, network, and validation errors
Sequential file staging is slow for large changesets (100+ files) - 5-10x speedup possible with batching
Missing usage examples in git-service.js documentation - Add @example JSDoc tags to GitService class methods
MCP server documentation outdated - Update header to reflect new modular architecture
